verbs.description: NEW YORK — [ARG0: President Donald Trump] [V: reached] [ARGM-DIR: out] [ARG2: to Roseanne Barr] [ARGM-PRP: to congratulate her] [ARGM-TMP: after her ABC sitcom reboot drew 18.4 million viewers] .
